overview:
Richard is the Founder and CEO of Eyetease.com, a high growth tech start-up based in London. Ranked in the top 100 UK startups 2012 and top 20 tech companies 2012, Eyetease has developed Europe’s first digital taxitop proposition, the iTaxitop, enabling location and time specific advertising across large networks of taxis in major cities.

In the past, Richard has worked for a variety of clients in media, entertainment, technology, leisure and retail sectors. He has worked closely with growth and innovation consultancies including, Edengene, WhatIf Innovation and Venturing Unlimited where he developed and launched new propositions. Richard has extensive experience taking new concepts to market, notably BT ‘Click&Buy’, Boots ‘Click and Collect’, Boots Advantage card re-launch and Barclaycard Freedom.
